narrative.title: Panzergruppe Afrika - 1942Q1
narrative.situation: German Army Headquarters deployed in North Africa during 1942Q1.
narrative.objectives: Army headquarters controlling German DAK and Italian mobile and infantry corps after successful January 1942 counter-offensive and recapture of Cyrenaica
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: coastal plain and rocky desert (Cyrenaica reconquered)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

environment.terrain_type: coastal plain and rocky desert (Cyrenaica reconquered)
